org.drip.portfolioconstruction.bayesian

Class BlackLittermanCustomConfidenceOutput

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.drip.portfolioconstruction.bayesian.BlackLittermanOutput
      • org.drip.portfolioconstruction.bayesian.BlackLittermanCustomConfidenceOutput

  • public class BlackLittermanCustomConfidenceOutput
extends BlackLittermanOutput
    BlackLittermanCustomConfidenceOutput holds the Outputs generated from a Custom COnfidence Black Litterman Bayesian COmbination Run. The References are: - He. G., and R. Litterman (1999): The Intuition behind the Black-Litterman Model Portfolios, Goldman Sachs Asset Management - Idzorek, T. (2005): A Step-by-Step Guide to the Black-Litterman Model: Incorporating User-Specified Confidence Levels, Ibbotson Associates, Chicago
    Author:
    Lakshmi Krishnamurthy
